PROJECTS
Name : Social E-com App
March 2024 - August 2024
Description : Developed a social e-commerce platform for sneakers and fashion items, leveraging Sopsy's 
infrastructure.
Conceived a unique online marketplace integrating social media and e-commerce, offering curated fashion 
products.
Roles and Responsibility : UI Development, Firebase/Firestore setup, Backend connectivity, Razaor-pay 
Integration.
Techniques : Flutter, Dart, State management (Setstate, provider ), Razorpay, Firebase hosting, Firebase Auth, 
Json etc.
Name : Meals Grid Recipes
Sept 2024 - Dec 2024
Description : Comprehensive multi-screen app for meals of all categories  and calories with engaging UI.
Innovative Flutter-based app with meals integrated along with their recipes', divided into categories and 
complexity levels.
Roles and Responsibility : Complete Application development. testing and debugging.
Techniques :  Flutter, Dart, State management (Setstate, provider), Navigations Through multi-Screen 
application, 
Name : Expense Tracker 
Jan 2025
Description :  Tracking Your daily Expense's and forming it into a chart, for easier assessment of your expenses.
Dynamic chart view changes according to expenses added ,With a Lean and Attractive UI.
Roles and Responsibility : Complete application development, testing and Debugging.
Techniques : Flutter, Dart, State management (Setstate, provider), Navigations Through multi-Screen application, 
sqﬂite , path, Maps and charts for chart development.
